abstract: Daniel Agyei (also spelled Adjei; born 10 November 1989 in Dansoman) is a Ghanaian professional footballer, who currently plays for South African Premier Division club Free State Stars and the Ghana national team, as a goalkeeper.
comment: Daniel Agyei (also spelled Adjei; born 10 November 1989 in Dansoman) is a Ghanaian professional footballer, who currently plays for South African Premier Division club Free State Stars and the Ghana national team, as a goalkeeper.
